title: Summoner Society looking for players for OOL team (APPS CLOSE THIS WEEKEND!)
body:
Summoner Society will be running an Esports team for OOL. We are looking for 5 players, that can represent our values and have fun. This is a great experience for players are looking to dip their toes in to the esports scene.

Please send us an email with the follow information:

Application
First & Last name:
In game name:
Age:
Roles:
Location:
Current Rank:
Can you use Discord?:
Any previous competitive  Experience in League of Legends:

Requirement:
• Working Microphone (Will be using discord)
• Mature.
• Over 16 years old.
• Must be willing to have fun
• Non Salty / Toxic.
• Friendly / Good Personality.
• Must be Diamond+ in game rank.

Contact:
LoL Name: Loststardust
E-Mail: summonerssocietyofficial@gmail.com

replies.body:
Name (IRL): Benjamin Wolff
IGN: Lovesick
Age: 17
Roles (in order of priority): Mid->ADC->Top
Location: Northern NSW 
Current rank: D5 (though this is a poor representation of my skill level as I could easily be top 10 in Challenger if I played enough)
Discord: Yes
Previous competitive experience: I've played in 7 tournaments, 3 years of OOL, played on 13 teams (3 being trial phase only, 2 as a sub) and a lot of scrims.

As for the requirements, the only issue I have would be "Good personality", as it's really up to perspective and how you take it, as right now I can be rather morbid. But if you can get past that I'm fine. Maturity wise, lets put it this way, I don't find trivial matters funny and I think about how to change the world on a daily basis. One bonus is that I've abandoned school (for personal reasons; depression and suicidal thoughts) and as such I'm now available 24/7.

I suppose I'm droning on now, but my godlike champions are: Vayne, Riven, Katarina, Ashe, Twitch, Fiora and Irelia. 
I can feasibly play every other champion in the game bar Azir, Taliyah and Aurelion Sol, but to a lesser extent to aforementioned core listed as godlike.

plication
First & Last name: Kael Hulin
In game name: Beyondplay
Age: 21
Roles: jungle, mid, adc
Location: ACT
Current Rank: Gold 5 but I feel like I should be around master rank if I tried
Can you use Discord?: Yes
Any previous competitive Experience in League of Legends: I play for the r5s team GGNG and am the main player and shot caller. I am friendly and easy to get along with. I also like to play with a specific strategy in mind and like to focus on a specific winning tactic
